text: I feel very confident when communicating with other people
I do very well when giving exhibitions or public presentations
I can easily strike up a conversation with a stranger
I easily identify the causes of problems
I can quickly solve any problem I identify
I don't rest until a problem is completely solved
I work better in a team than individually
I easily adapt to the groups or teams I have to work with
I always fulfill all the tasks or responsibilities assigned to me in a group work
Before making a decision, I look for information
I am always very careful to verify the information I need to make a decision
I can easily find patterns when analyzing information or data
I am one of those people that others identify as creative
I always explore creative ways to carry out the tasks or responsibilities assigned to me
If creativity is needed to solve a problem, they call me
When working in a group, I am one of the people who takes the initiative before others
I can easily organize the tasks that each person has to perform when working in a group
I can easily get people to follow my ideas
I quickly adapt to unforeseen changes or situations
Even if things don't go as expected, I usually accept them and move on
When I see that the results are not being achieved, I can change my way of working
I always meet deadlines for deliveries or tasks
When I have several tasks or responsibilities, I set priorities to dedicate more time to some
I can perform several tasks or responsibilities at the same time
I consider myself a very organized person
I usually organize my tasks or responsibilities according to certain criteria
Before starting a job, I plan in detail what I am going to do
I usually do very well with numbers
I do better performing mathematical calculations than any other activity
I usually have an easy time performing mathematical calculations
I dedicate a significant part of my time to reading
I write coherent texts with great ease
I usually easily identify the thesis of a text and the arguments that defend it
I am seduced by the idea of understanding how things work
I am able to find accurate information that allows me to deeply understand a topic
I can formulate a hypothesis and propose a way to solve it
I am one of those people who are always asked for help with digital tools
I usually quickly learn how to use a new technological tool
I seek to understand how digital platforms work
In a work environment, I would prefer to work in a team
I prefer to work with company and not alone
I like helping people solve problems
I would rather work in customer service than in administrative services
I have the skills to convince people to buy or acquire products and services
I would rather work in sales than in administrative tasks
I would like to work in data analysis
I prefer working with numbers than with texts
If I had the opportunity, I would like to work helping people
Helping people moves me more than working with numbers
I prefer working by interacting with people rather than interacting with things or machines
For me, interacting with people is more interesting than working alone
I would like to work in an environment where I have to speak in public
I would rather work writing texts than interacting with people
I would like to work in an environment where I can be very creative
I would choose an environment where I can innovate rather than one where I have to do pre-established things
For me, a job where everything is planned in advance will always be better
I would prefer a stable work environment rather than one where things change frequently
I am one of those people who are very open in social settings
I can easily start a conversation with strangers
I like to try new activities and explore different approaches to problem-solving
I tend to be very organized and carefully plan my tasks and responsibilities
I strive to complete my projects on time and fulfill my commitments
I always take on my responsibilities even if I don't feel like doing the tasks
I like to socialize and meet new people in different social settings
I enjoy being the center of attention and actively participating in group conversations
I usually feel energized when I interact with other people and have many opportunities to socialize
I make an effort to understand others' perspectives and treat people with empathy and understanding
I consider myself a friendly person and willing to help others when they need it
I value interpersonal relationships and strive to maintain a harmonious and peaceful environment
I remain calm and composed even in stressful or challenging situations
I am not easily affected by setbacks and can quickly recover from difficult times
I tend to be an emotionally stable person and am rarely overwhelmed by anxiety or worry
